#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int n,i,sum,p,ar[1001],j,k,t; // if there are 1000 elements and guranted that each element is less than thousnd 
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
    scanf("%d %d",&n,&sum);
    for(i=0;i<1001;i++)
    	ar[i]=0;
    ar[0]=1;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
     {
     scanf("%d",&p);
      for(j=sum-p;j>=0&&ar[sum]==0;j--)
      {
      	if(ar[j]==1)
      		ar[j+p]=1;
      }

       }
    printf("%d\n",ar[sum]);  
  }
	return 0;
}
